desc: Piccola Jewelry | Find the perfect personalized jewellery, specializing in family name, initial and birthstone necklaces, bracelets & charms to honor the special Mom or Grandmother in your life. Also offering custom made remembrance and pet jewelry in gold fill and sterling silver. Handmade in Nova Scotia, Canada.

layout.text: NAME, INITIAL & BIRTHSTONE NECKLACES, BRACELETS & CHARMS
